description: PDF map of areas served or underserved by broadband service (defined for this map as internet download speeds > 3 MBPS). Broadband service is based on the October 2013 submission of broadband data to the National Telecommunications and Information Administration.

metadata.attribution: Colorado Broadband Data and Development Program

name: Broadband Served / Underserved Areas Map (Oct 2013)
